cookieMessage: By using this site you agree to SmartBuy's use of cookies to give you a personalised experience. Please read the cookie policy for more information or to delete/block them.

lang.amazonpupbelowText: * To avail Upto 5X Reward Points/ 5% Cashback, please use above entered card at final payment. TnC Apply.
lang.amazon_importantText:
SmartBuy offer benefits are not applicable on usage of non HDFC Bank payment instruments

Upto 5X Reward Points on select HDFC Bank Credit Card/ 5% Cashback on other HDFC Bank Debit, Credit Cards & PayZapp offer is only on items added to cart on Amazon immediately after landing from the HDFC Bank SmartBuy. The offer will NOT be applicable on items that were already in the users cart (added during a previous session) but need to be added post landing from the HDFC Bank SmartBuy platform only.

home_landing.home_landing_deals: No 3Xreward points and 1% cash back offer applicable on this section.
home_landing.home_landing_terms:
Get up to 10 times Reward points on select HDFC Bank Credit Card.
or 1% Cashback on other HDFC Bank Credit Cards.
or 1% Cashback on HDFC Bank Debit Card on transacting through SmartBuy.

lang.flights_muliticity: Get 5X Rewards Points on select HDFC Bank Credit Card or 5% CashBack on other HDFC Bank Debit, Credit Cards and PayZapp for Multi-city booking through SmartBuy Concierge.
lang.amazon_commondisclimerPoints: Get Upto 5X Reward Points on select HDFC Bank Credit Card
lang.amazon_commondisclimerCahback: Get 5% Cashback on other HDFC Bank Debit, Credit Card & PayZapp
lang.amazon_commondisclimerNote: To avail Upto 5X Reward Points/ 5% Cashback on your respective card, please make sure you enter below details at final purchase.
lang.mspDealsPoints: Get 3X Reward Points on select HDFC Bank Credit Card
lang.mspDealsCashback: Get 1% Cashback on other HDFC Bank Debit, Credit Card & PayZapp
lang.mspDealsNote1: 3X on Credit Card is not applicable on EMI transaction. It is only applicable on full swipe transaction.
lang.mspDealsNote2: To avail 3X Reward Points on your respective card, please make sure you enter below details at final purchase.
lang.mspDetailsCashback: Get 1% Cashback on other HDFC Bank Debit, Credit Card & PayZapp
lang.mspDetailNote1: 3X on select HDFC Bank Credit Card or 1% Cashback on other HDFC Bank Debit, Credit Card & PayZapp. It is not applicable on EMI transaction, only applicable on full swipe transaction.
lang.mspDetailNote2: To avail 3X Reward Points/1% Cashback on your respective card, please make sure you enter below details at final purchase.
lang.freshMenu_helpline: Please reach out to order@freshmenu.in \n or call on 080-40424242
lang.flipkartbelowText: * To avail Upto 3X Reward Points or 1% Cashback, please use above entered card at final payment. TnC Apply.
lang.flipkart_importantText:
SmartBuy offer benefits are not applicable on usage of non HDFC Bank payment instruments

Upto 3X Reward points on select HDFC Bank Credit Card / 1% Cashback on other HDFC Bank Debit, Credit Cards & PayZapp. Offer is only on items added to the cart on Flipkart immediately after landing from HDFC Bank SmartBuy. The offer will NOT be applicable on items that were already in the users cart (added during a previous session) but need to be added post landing from the HDFC Bank SmartBuy platform only.
lang.amazon_home_salesCss: .new-blinks_home_amazon img { position: absolute; top: 4px; left: -3px; width: 145px !important; height: 21px !important; z-index: 1; }
lang.amazon_header_salesCss: <style> .new-blinks_amazon img { position: absolute; top: -7px; left: -55px; width: 110px !important; height: 21px !important; z-index: 1; } </style>
lang.flipkart_home_salesCss: .new-blinks_home_flipkart { position: absolute; top: -20px; left: -3px; width: 137px !important; height: 21px !important; z-index: 1; }
lang.flipkart_header_salesCss: <style> .new-blinks_flipkart img { position: absolute; top: -6px; left: -55px; width: 110px !important; height: 21px !important; z-index: 1; } </style>
lang.mmtpupbelowText: * To avail 10X Reward Points/5% Cashback, please use above entered card at final payment. TnC Apply.
lang.mmtpup_importantText:
1. This redirection holds good only for MMT Hotels module via SmartBuy. Hence, 10X RP/5% CB benefit would only be applicable for MMT Hotels via SmartBuy.
2. The payment modes for MMT Hotels have been restricted to only HDFC Bank payment methods. No other payment instruments can be utilised here. This again would only be applicable for MMT Hotels via SmartBuy.
lang.cspupbelowText: * To avail 5X Reward Points/5% Cashback, please use above entered card at final payment. TnC Apply.
lang.cs_popup_importantText:
1. This redirection holds good only for C&S Hotels module via SmartBuy. Hence, 5X RP/5% CB benefit would only be applicable for C&S via SmartBuy.
2. The payment modes for C&S have been restricted to only HDFC Bank payment methods. No other payment instruments can be utilised here. This again would only be applicable for C&S via SmartBuy.
lang.otpvalidation_message: You have exceeded maximum entry of OTPs. Please regenerate a new OTP or proceed with other payment options.
lang.sessionexpiry_message: Session expired! Please regenerate a new OTP or proceed with other payment options.
lang.maxqty: Maximum :max quantities are allowed per order. If you wish to redeem more than :max quantities, please place another subsequent order for :pro.
lang.stockqty: Only :max quantity available in stock for :pro
lang.zerocount: Maximum :max quantities are allowed per order. If you wish to redeem more than :max quantities, please place another subsequent order for :pro.
lang.qcdeliverymes: Your e-vouchers will be delivered to your Bank registered email & mobile number within 30 mins
lang.nonqcdeliverymes:
Delivery Information:
e-Vouchers within 24 Hours
Physical Vouchers/Products within 7 Working Days

SmartBuy offer benefits are not applicable on usage of non HDFC Bank payment instruments.

The offer will NOT be applicable on items that were already in the users cart (added during a previous session) but need to be added post landing from the HDFC Bank SmartBuy platform only.

amazon.amazon_pup_dearcustomer:
By clicking on the hyperlink you will be exiting HDFC Bank SmartBuy website and entering into the Merchant‘s website. This link is provided only for the convenience of HDFC Bank‘s customers, HDFC Bank will not earn any commission or any other fee upon its Customers viewing the offers made available by Merchants or purchasing/ availing of a Product/Service offered by Merchants, except the customary considerations for use of credit card/debit cards/net banking facility. The Customer is free to purchase/avail them from any other stores/online platforms and by using any other payment mechanism.

HDFC Bank is not selling/rendering any of these Products/Services. Neither is HDFC Bank guaranteeing nor making any representation with respect to the offers made by the merchants and HDFC Bank is not liable /responsible for sale/quality/features of the Products/Services selected for purchase by the customers. HDFC Bank is merely facilitating the payment by its Customers by providing the Payment Gateway Services.
